InstructionData.Title: PCS-VPAV-HP-PID
InstructionData.Author: Unknown
InstructionData.Instructions:
# PCS-VPAV-HP-PID # Pressure Control System # Volume Pump => Active Vent # With hazard protection # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library alias GasSensor d0 # Pressure alias Supply d1 # Setting alias Exhaust d2 # PressureInternal/External alias Hazard d3 # On
define SETPOINT 101.325 define DIFF 1 define OVERSHOOT 2 define TOXIC 0.5 #kpa define KpIn 10 define KpOut 2
alias sp r1 alias error r2 alias bias r3 alias pv r4 alias ventinact r5 alias ventoutact r6 alias output r7 alias kp r8 alias hazard r10 alias temp1 r13 alias temp2 r14
s Supply Lock 0 s Exhaust Lock 0 s Exhaust Mode 1 move sp SETPOINT sub ventinact SETPOINT DIFF add ventoutact SETPOINT DIFF
ok: s Supply On 0 s Exhaust On 0 l pv GasSensor Pressure blt pv ventinact lowpressure bgt pv ventoutact highpressure move kp 1 move bias sp jal calcpid jal checkhazard yield j ok
lowpressure: l pv GasSensor Pressure bgt pv sp ok move kp KpIn add bias 0 5 #move bias 0 jal calcpid s Supply On 1 s Supply Setting output jal checkhazard yield j lowpressure
highpressure: l pv GasSensor Pressure blt pv sp ok move kp KpOut sub bias sp OVERSHOOT jal calcpid s Exhaust On 1 s Exhaust PressureExternal output s Exhaust PressureInternal 40000 jal checkhazard yield j highpressure
calcpid: sub error sp pv mul error kp error s db Setting error add output bias error j ra
checkhazard: l temp1 GasSensor RatioVolatiles l temp2 GasSensor RatioPollutant add temp1 temp1 temp2 # volatiles + pollutant mul temp1 temp1 pv # toxins * pressure sge hazard temp1 TOXIC beqz hazard safe s Hazard On 1 safe: j ra
